domain.en: Founder of Buddhism, the Enlightened One

description.zh-TW: 釋迦牟尼佛是佛教的創立者，象徵覺悟與慈悲。
description.en: Shakyamuni Buddha is the founder of Buddhism, symbolizing enlightenment and compassion.

story.zh-TW: 本名悉達多太子，出家修行成佛，教化眾生。
story.en: Born as Prince Siddhartha, he renounced royal life, attained enlightenment, and taught the Dharma.

description.zh-TW: 觀世音菩薩以慈悲著稱，廣受信仰。
description.en: Guanyin Bodhisattva is renowned for compassion and is widely worshipped.

story.zh-TW: 傳說觀音菩薩千處祈求千處應，救苦救難。
story.en: Legend says Guanyin responds to every plea, saving those in distress.

domain.zh-TW: 救度亡靈，地獄不空誓不成佛
domain.en: Savior of the deceased, vows not to become Buddha until hell is empty

description.zh-TW: 地藏王菩薩以大願力著稱，救度亡靈。
description.en: Kṣitigarbha is known for great vows, saving souls from suffering.

story.zh-TW: 發願地獄不空誓不成佛，廣度眾生。
story.en: Vowed not to become Buddha until all hells are empty, saving countless beings.

description.zh-TW: 文殊菩薩象徵大智慧，常持寶劍。
description.en: Manjushri Bodhisattva symbolizes great wisdom, often depicted with a sword.

story.zh-TW: 文殊菩薩以智慧度化眾生。
story.en: Manjushri uses wisdom to enlighten all beings.

description.zh-TW: 普賢菩薩象徵實踐與大願。
description.en: Samantabhadra Bodhisattva symbolizes practice and great vows.

story.zh-TW: 普賢菩薩以實踐與願力度化眾生。
story.en: Samantabhadra enlightens beings through practice and vows.
